name: China io (opoly)
description:
China io is a game that celebrates China. Learn about China as you travel to and buy historic properties. Travel to famous landmarks as you collect and trade properties. Choose your favorite pictures from your photo gallery and see them in the game as well. Easily create a fun strategic opoly-style board game for any occasion your photos call for while celebrating the greatness of The People's Republic of China.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
